duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide health promotion and maintenance through the diagnosis and treatment of acute illness and chronic conditions.
Prescribe medication, examine patients, diagnose illnesses, and provide treatment.
Develop functional strategies on matters of significance and exercise independent judgment on complex issues.
Utilize EMR charting, support for prescription refills, lab follow-up, and coordinated care management.
Work in-home to provide patient care for 1-2 patients per hour, maintaining interpersonal relationships with patients and families.
Participate in Humana/Senior Bridge's Tuberculosis (TB) screening program and adhere to vaccine policies and other healthcare protocols.
Demonstrate high levels of professionalism, integrity, compassion, and willingness to work in a revolutionary healthcare environment.

education_certification.credential: Active BLS through the AHA (American Heart Association) or ARC (American Red Cross)
